fields.name: RPN
fields.description: Unit Register Page Number (within its NRR)

fields.name: NRRI
fields.description:
Identifier of the Ncore 3 Register Region
in which this unit resides

fields.name: Valid
fields.description:
Value of 1 validates this register. This bit
is set to 1 if the unit is implemented.

fields.name: FUnitId
fields.description: Fabric Unit Identifier of the unit

registers.name: CREDIT
registers.description: Credit on a per message type basis
registers.csrDescription: Credit on a per message type basis.

registers.name: USMCMCR0
registers.description: Unit System Memory Cache Maintenance Control Register
registers.csrDescription: Unit System Memory Cache Maintenance Control Register

fields.name: MntOp
fields.description:
This field encodes the cache maintenance operation to be performed:
0x0: Initialize all Entries
0x1-0x3: Reserved
0x4: Flush All Entries
0x5: Flush Entry at Set and Way
0x6: Flush Entry at Address
0x7: Flush Address Range
0x8: Flush Set Way Range
0x9-0xB: Reserved
0xC: Debug Read Entry at set, way, and word
0xD: Reserved
0xE: Debug Write Entry at set, way, and word
0xF: Reserved

fields.name: ArrayID
fields.description:
This field selects the array on which the cache maintenance operation is to be performed:
  0x00: Tag Array 
  0x01: Data Array
  0x02-0x3F: Reserved

fields.name: SecAttr
fields.description:
This bit indicates the value of the security attribute of the address for the cache maintenance operation is to be performed. 
If the cache maintenance operation does not operate on an address, the value of this bit should be zero.

registers.name: USMCMAR0
registers.description: Unit System Memory Cache Maintenance Activity Register
registers.csrDescription: Unit System Memory Cache Maintenance Activity Register

fields.name: MntOpActv
fields.description: This bit is set when any cache maintenance operation is in progress and is clear otherwise

registers.name: USMCMLR00
registers.description: Unit System Memory Cache Maintenance Location Register 0
registers.csrDescription: Unit System Memory Cache Maintenance Location Register 0

fields.name: MntSet
fields.description: The field indicates the set on which the maintenance operation is to be performed

fields.name: MntWay
fields.description: This field indicates the way on which the maintenance operation is to be performed.

fields.name: MntWord
fields.description: This field indicates the data word on which the maintenance operation is to be performed.

registers.name: USMCMLR10
registers.description: Unit System Memory Cache Maintenance Location Register 1
registers.csrDescription: Unit System Memory Cache Maintenance Location Register 1

fields.name: MntAddr
fields.description: This field contains the high-order address bits of the address on which the maintenance operation is to be performed

fields.name: MntRange
fields.description:
This field indicates the range for flush operations in number of cache lines.
This field is used when doing flushes based on address or set/way range.

registers.name: USMCMDR0
registers.description: Unit System Memory Cache Maintenance Data Register
registers.csrDescription: Unit System Memory Cache Maintenance Data Register

fields.name: MntData
fields.description: This field contains the data resulting from a maintenance read operation or the data to be used for a maintenance write operation.

registers.name: QOS
registers.description: Credit adjustment per target type basis
registers.csrDescription: Credit adjustment per target type basis: 0x1: Max 1. 0x2: Max 2. 0x3: Max 3. 0x5: Minus 1. 0x6: Minus 2. 0x7: Minus 3. 0x9: 1 read others writes. 0xa: Reserve 1 write. 0xb: No limit. 0xd: reserve 1 extra write, 0xe: reserve 2 extra writes, 0xf: reserve 3 extra writes, Others: no change

registers.name: PERIOD
registers.csrDescription: Specify period length for starvation detection

fields.name: EVENT
fields.description: Event counter period in granularity of 16.

fields.name: ProtErrDetEn
fields.description: AXI downstream protocol error detect enable: When set, errors will be detected from the downstream AXI interface.

fields.name: TransErrDetEn
fields.description: Concerto Transport error detect enable: When set, errors will be detected from the Concerto Transport.

fields.name: MemErrDetEn
fields.description: Memory protection error detection enable: When set,errors will be detected from any RAM memory arrays.

fields.name: ProtErrIntEn
fields.description: Downstream AXI uncorrectable error interrupt enable.

fields.name: TransErrIntEn
fields.description: Concerto Transport uncorrectable error interrupt enable.

fields.name: MemErrIntEn
fields.description: RAM memory uncorrectable error interrupt enable.

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: If this bit is set, Error information is logged in status and location registers. Writing a one to the Correctable Error Valid bit clears the Correctable Error Valid bit.

fields.name: ErrType
fields.description: This field indicates the logged error type

fields.name: ErrInfo
fields.description: This field indicates additional information about logged error

fields.name: ErrEntry
fields.description: This field indicates the entry or the set in which the logged error was detected

fields.name: ErrWay
fields.description: This field indicates the way in which the logged error was detected

fields.name: ErrWord
fields.description: This field indicates the data word in which the logged error was detected

fields.name: ErrAddr
fields.description: This field contains the high-order address bits of the transaction that encountered the error

registers.name: UUESAR
registers.description: Unit Uncorrectable Error Status Alias Register
registers.csrDescription: Unit Uncorrectable Error Status Alias Register

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: Alias bit for setting error valid filed of xUESR

fields.name: ErrType
fields.description: Alias bit for setting error type field of xUESR

fields.name: ErrInfo
fields.description: Alias bit for setting errro info field of xUESR

fields.name: ErrDetEn
fields.description: If this bit is set, then correctable error detection and logging is enabled; otherwise, correctable error detection and logging is disabled.

fields.name: ErrIntEn
fields.description: If this bit is set, the Correctable Error Interrupt output signal is asserted when the number of correctable errors corrected equals the value in ErrThreshold field; otherwise, the correctable error interrupt signal is never asserted.

fields.name: ErrThreshold
fields.description: This field determines the number of correctable errors that must be corrected before the Correctable Error Interrupt output signal is asserted.

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: If this bit is set, Error information is logged in status and location registers. Writing a one to the Correctable Error Valid bit clears the Correctable Error Valid bit.

fields.name: ErrCountOverflow
fields.description: This bit indicates that the number of correctable errors detected by the unit overflowed the Correctable Error Count field

fields.name: ErrCount
fields.description: This field indicates the number of correctable errors detected by the unit. The field stops incrementing if the Correctable Error Count Overflow bit is set

fields.name: ErrType
fields.description: This field indicates the logged error type

fields.name: ErrInfo
fields.description: This field indicates additional information about logged error

fields.name: ErrEntry
fields.description: This field indicates the entry or the set in which the logged error was detected

fields.name: ErrWay
fields.description: This field indicates the way in which the logged error was detected

fields.name: ErrWord
fields.description: This field indicates the data word in which the logged error was detected

fields.name: ErrAddr
fields.description: This field contains the high-order address bits of the transaction that encountered the error

registers.name: UCESAR
registers.description: Unit Correctable Error Status Alias Register
registers.csrDescription: Unit Correctable Error Status Alias Register

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: Alias bit for setting error valid filed of xCESR

fields.name: ErrCountOverflow
fields.description: Alias bit for ssetting Error Count Overflow field of xCESR

fields.name: ErrCount
fields.description: Alias field for setting error Count field of xCESR

fields.name: ErrType
fields.description: Alias bit for setting error type field of xCESR

fields.name: ErrInfo
fields.description: Alias bit for setting errro info field of xCESR

fields.name: ResThreshold
fields.description: Threshold for the uncorrectable error indication to the functional safety controller.

registers.name: GP0RBLR
registers.description: General Purpose Region Base Address Register
registers.csrDescription: General Purpose Region Base Address Register

registers.name: GP0RBHR
registers.description: General Purpose Region Base Address Register
registers.csrDescription: General Purpose Region Base Address Register

registers.name: GP1RBLR
registers.description: General Purpose Region Base Address Register
registers.csrDescription: General Purpose Region Base Address Register

registers.name: GP1RBHR
registers.description: General Purpose Region Base Address Register
registers.csrDescription: General Purpose Region Base Address Register

registers.name: GP2RBLR
registers.description: General Purpose Region Base Address Register
registers.csrDescription: General Purpose Region Base Address Register

registers.name: GP2RBHR
registers.description: General Purpose Region Base Address Register
registers.csrDescription: General Purpose Region Base Address Register

registers.name: NRSBHR
registers.description: NRSBHR is used to stage the writing of the Base address of the NRS

fields.name: NRSBA
fields.description: NRSBA field indicates bits[51:20] of the Base address of the Ncore Register Space

registers.name: NRSBLR
registers.description: NRSBLR is used to load the NRSBAR from NRSBHR

fields.name: NRSDIIId
fields.description: This field is set to NUId of the DII to which the Ncore is connected

fields.name: BALoaded
fields.description: This field is set when NRSBHR is stored into and reset when this register is read
